name: Windowmaker
description:
My entry in BoltJam #2 - Theme: Window

Once a humble craftsman, the Windowmaker takes up his rifle to make things right.

Look through your sniper rifle's little window and take care of the undead!

Shoot the candle in the clocktower for bonus points and time.

Left Shift - Grappling Hook

Space - Jump/Double Jump

Hold Space - Wall Climb

Right Click - Scope In

Left Click - Shoot
